data.text: @LadyVelvet_HFQ Really very sad. Can the UK really have an influence over the Ukraine situation if the government won't engage with France and Germany? Is this the ghost of Brexit?
@LadyVelvet_HFQ There's nothing wrong to give yourself credit for these wonderful creations. I truly love them. Thank you again for sharing these beauties with world.

@LadyVelvet_HFQ What a perfect artist he/she would have been who painted these pics with his/her calm soul, however you should have named the artist as well if you had that. Nevertheless thanks for sharing.

@LadyVelvet_HFQ 7,000 Ukrainian troops invaded a sovereign Iraq in 2003 for no reason. They aided to hang democratically elected president. The Ukrainians served as the third-largest Coalition forces contingent during Iraqi occupation. 
Hundreds of thousands were killed because of the Ukrainian
